ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget):
registro = widget.Entity
if registro == None: return
if(registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 1 or registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 10): widget.View.Commands["CMD_LIBERAR"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_IMPRIMIR"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_VoltarStatus"].Visible = False
elif(registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 15 or registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 11 or registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 6 or registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 7 or registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 8 or registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 4): widget.View.Commands["CMD_LIBERAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_IMPRIMIR"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_VoltarStatus"].Visible = True
elif(registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 2): widget.View.Commands["CMD_LIBERAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_IMPRIMIR"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_VoltarStatus"].Visible = True elif(registro.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 3): widget.View.Commands["CMD_LIBERAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_CANCELAR"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["CMD_IMPRIMIR"].Visible = True widget.View.Commands["CMD_VoltarStatus"].Visible = False
